title: Zac Chroma Bug
body: i have the zac chroma skin and in champ select for Coop vs. AI and Blind pick the small squares that allow you to change the skins arent there and im stuck with one of them and ive sent 2 tickets for help cause idk what to do .-. pls fix this

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! Are you experiencing this every game when you're in Co-op v. AI or Blind Pick?
